document.full_text: - japan won pledges of help on sunday from china and south korea in its efforts to recover from a an earthquake, tsunami and nuclear crisis that rocked the nation in march, with beijing promising to start easing curbs on japanese food imports.
document.title: china, south korea vow help in japan recovery
lines_and_colors: - japan won pledges of help on sunday from china and south korea in its efforts to recover from a an earthquake, tsunami and nuclear crisis that rocked the nation in march, with beijing promising to start easing curbs on japanese food imports.
